Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Anesthesia \An`es*the"si*a\, n., Anesthetic \An`es*thet"ic\, a. Same as {An[ae]sthesia}, {An[ae]sthetic}. [1913 Webster]
anesthesia n : loss of bodily sensation with or without loss of consciousness [syn: {anaesthesia}]
